entry.p: This self-publishing stuff is fun! Over the last few months I've published both The Tao of Roark: Variations on a Theme from Ayn Rand and Letters on Happiness: An Epicurean Dialogue. Recently I added another book to the list: Ancient Fire, a collection of poems and translations that I made in the 1990s. Despite the fact that I don't claim to be more than a second- or third-rank poet, I've received positive feedback over the years about several of the poems in this collection so I figured it would be good to make them available in print and ebook formats. Next on my list: a printed version of The Ism Book (currently under revision yet again).
